seconds_btw_updates: {:0.0f} seconds between updates of car values
soc_minimum_start: Start charging if house battery SOC >= {:0.0f}%
soc_minimum_stop: Stop charging if house battery SOC <= {:0.0f}%
evsoc_limit_low: Start lower charging if car SOC < {:0.0f}%
evstart_power_low: Start lower charging if net flow < {:0,.0f}kW
evstop_power_low: Stop lower charging if net flow > {:0,.0f}kw
evsoc_limit_high: Start higher charging until {:.0f}% car SOC
evstart_power_high: Start higher charging if net flow < {:0,.0f}kW
evstop_power_high: Stop higher charging if net flow > {:0,.0f}kw
